title: Ray-Ban Meta - Wayfarer (Standard) Smart Glasses - Shiny Black, Clear
description:
The Ray-Ban Meta Wayfarer Smart Glasses in Shiny Black with Clear lenses are a high-tech and stylish accessory for both men and women. These designer sunglasses feature a square frame made of injected material, ensuring durability and longevity. With Ray-Ban's signature black lens color and glass material, these smart glasses offer a sleek and sophisticated look for any outfit or occasion. The Meta AI model provides cutting-edge features and performance while maintaining the classic Ray-Ban style and brand reputation.

- Material: Injected frame material

- Smart Features: Cutting-edge Meta AI

Ideal for those seeking a fashionable and functional eyewear option. Comes with original box and case. Fast shipping and secure checkout at HappyDeel.
